newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: BUDGET COLLECTION SHORT 82 MLN LITAS IN Q1.
newsitem.headline: BUDGET COLLECTION SHORT 82 MLN LITAS IN Q1.

text.p: The Lithuanian state budget failed to collect 82.2 million litas in the first quarter of the year, a finance ministry spokeswoman said on Tuesday.
The planned revenue was 1.26 billion litas, she told Reuters.
She also said that in March the collection exceeded planned revenues by 38.7 million litas.
She said that the figures were preliminary data and that final figures for the first quarter are expected in nine days.
